segments.text: Adam , could you show me around the school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean the white building near the playground ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is the library . And it has more than 1,000 , 000 books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the building to the south of the library ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , our school is divided into two parts , the junior high school and the senior high school . That is the new classroom building for our senior high school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a swimming pool in your school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There is a large swimming pool , but it is only available in summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do envy you . And I hope I can enter your school one day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe that you can make your dream come true .
segments.speaker: S2
